title: Wanderer
description: I've lived two lives. One full of innocence and one full of sin.Now revenge, mayhem, and loss are all I know.I wandered through the darkness until I found a new place to call home. Today I'm Satan's deadliest soldier.A former nomad, tormented by his demons and heavy with regret. A man coming face-to-face with the biggest failure of his life. Her. The girl I let go. The woman I'll ruin if I stay.
author: Janine Infante Bosco
